sentences.sContent: There are but two things that chiefly excite us to love woman, an attractive beauty and unspotted fame. ——Miguel de Cervantes.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are but two things that chiefly excite us to love woman, an attractive beauty and unspotted fame. ——Miguel de Cervantes.
sentences.sCn: 能激发我们去爱女人的，主要有两样东西：动人的美貌和清白的名声。——塞万提斯。

sentences.sContent: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
sentences.sCn: 在神我们的父面前，那清洁没有玷污的虔诚，就是看雇在患难中的孤儿寡妇，并且保守自己不沾染世俗。

synos.tran: 清白的；无瑕疵的；无污点的

remMethod.val: un(不) + spot(污点) + ted → 无污点的
